content: I think I'll start by checking out The North Face and Canada Goose websites, and then move on to ThredUp and eBay to see what they have in terms of gently used or previous-season coats. I've had good luck with ThredUp in the past, and I've been wanting to try eBay as well. Do you think I should also consider buying a coat with a removable fleece liner or a coat with a waterproof and breathable membrane, like Gore-Tex or similar technology?
